InitBlock.name: PREVIOUS_QUARTER

DBMapItem.name: SQLServer70
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT PRV.PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D PRV , VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D CUR WHERE convert(char(12),PRV.DAY_DT)=convert(char(12),CUR.QUARTER_AGO_DT) AND convert(char(12),CUR.DAY_DT)=convert(char(12),getdate()-valueof(time_offset))

DBMapItem.name: Oracle9i
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT PRV.PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D PRV , VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D CUR WHERE to_date(PRV.DAY_DT)=to_date(CUR.QUARTER_AGO_DT) AND to_date(CUR.DAY_DT)=to_date(sysdate - VALUEOF(TIME_OFFSET))

DBMapItem.name: DB2V8
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT PRV.PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D PRV , VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D CUR WHERE date(PRV.DAY_DT)=date(CUR.QUARTER_AGO_DT) AND date(CUR.DAY_DT)=date(current_date - VALUEOF(TIME_OFFSET) DAYS)

DBMapItem.name: TeradataV2R5
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT PRV.PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D PRV , VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D CUR WHERE cast(PRV.DAY_DT as timestamp)=cast(CUR.QUARTER_AGO_DT as timestamp) AND cast(CUR.DAY_DT as timestamp) = cast((current_date - interval 'VALUEOF(TIME_OFFSET)' day) as timestamp)

DBMapItem.name: TeradataV2R4
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT PRV.PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D PRV , VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D CUR WHERE cast(PRV.DAY_DT as timestamp)=cast(CUR.QUARTER_AGO_DT as timestamp) AND cast(CUR.DAY_DT as timestamp) = cast((current_date - interval 'VALUEOF(TIME_OFFSET)' day) as timestamp)

DBMapItem.name: DefaultMulDB
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT PRV.PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D PRV , VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D CUR WHERE to_date(PRV.DAY_DT)=to_date(CUR.QUARTER_AGO_DT) AND to_date(CUR.DAY_DT)=to_date(sysdate - VALUEOF(TIME_OFFSET))

InitBlock.InitString: SELECT PRV.PER_NAME_QTR FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D PRV , VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_DAY_D CUR WHERE to_date(PRV.DAY_DT)=to_date(CUR.QUARTER_AGO_DT) AND to_date(CUR.DAY_DT)=to_date(sysdate - VALUEOF(TIME_OFFSET))
